  • Method Details

    • isSameUser

      public static boolean isSameUser​(User a, User b)
      Test if two different objects of User are the same user. (i.e. if they have the same UserThread and therefore are connected to the same client.) For example if Player a is User b.
      Parameters:
      a - first user
      b - second user
      Returns:
      true if they are the same user, otherwise false

    • message

      public void message​(java.lang.String message)
      Outputs a message to the user via its UserThread.
      Parameters:
      message - the message to be sent

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the user, i.e. the user's name.
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      the name of the user

    • getThread

      public UserThread getThread()
      Gets the thread of the user.
      Returns:
      the related thread

    • setThread

      public void setThread​(UserThread thread)
      Sets the thread of the user.
      Parameters:

    • getName

      public java.lang.String getName()

    • getLastDate

      public java.time.LocalDate getLastDate()
